chapter.text: You keep walking through the fair. ^1500Everything is the same, yet different. ^1500Repeating carousels and rides of different colors make everything too overwhelming to look at, but you must keep going. ^1500You look to the sky and try to make out a star to at least see if youâ€™re going in the same direction. ^1500When you look up, you can only see a black sky and the glow of the attractions below it.
